name: Falling (TheTacBanana)
description:
Falling is a game developed for Alakajam #4, the theme being Falling

Your goal is to get through as many randomly generated spike layers as you can, use A & D to navigate as you fall and gain speed. My record is 31.

This game was made over the 48hr period of the Jam, I hope you enjoy testing and playing it, please feel free to be critical in the comments.

https://alakajam.com/4th-alakajam/390/falling/
